relatedArtifact.label: COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Module
relatedArtifact.display: The Module enables hospitals to report daily counts of patients with suspected and confirmed COVID-19 diagnoses and current use and availability of hospital beds and mechanical ventilators.
relatedArtifact.citation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN)
